message:
Dear,
INVESTORS

LAND INVESTMENT  PROPOSAL ON MAKASSAR SOUTH SULAWESI INDONESIA
 With your  company address which  I  got in the internet, herewith allow me to introduce my self  to you
 My name is Alam  "/ native son of  Sulawesi, and I worked  in tourism " tour & travel " special for Sulawesi.  
I want to offering a plot of land to  you which is suitable for investment in Makassar South Sulawesi whose numbers rather so widely around approximately 500 Ha â€“ up . shaped  fish form  and gardens that can be buy  either small part or in whole, and at first glance I attach a photo from google. 
The land is suitable for: Housing, Warehousing, Container company, Industry, Hotels, Fisheries. or  for Investment only/ causes are on the seafront. By varying the relative price is still quite cheap with a range between Rp .. 75,000 (USD.7) , - 100,000 (USD.9) , 150,000 (USD. 12), - to Rp. 250.000 (USD.22), - per meter square in one plot and listed in the map Block from the area of the land is public land property rights which have all been certified and clean of any form of dispute. and Community / owner of the land even government officials Village / Village Head had told me to looking for buyer / investor, with my position is just as Informant and not as  broker, and I just intend  want to be a team of field operators to collect all necessaries such   certificate and business affairs and other associated with the land.
 So my submission to you  only for an investment offer, because the land is quite promising where  from year to year the price of land will be expensive  and development in South Sulawesi are growing well  of eastern Indonesia 
Highly appreciated for your  attention & consideration and if you  interest please  donâ€™t   hesitate to contact me directly either by E-mail or  Telephone and you can spent your a little time to come to Makassar and I will drive to see the location and pick up his Blog Map, as well as to meet with the owners and government officials  even Up to Regent./ Bapak Bupati
Best regards
Alam (mr.)
E-mail : alamnusantaratour@gmail.com
Telp. +62  81342708665
www.alamnusantaratour.com

Hey CIMB Bank Stupid !! I've been trying to login into my CIMB Clicks like a dozen of times. The issue was I'm not able to login as your page said server slow due to high traffic volume. Then I try my luck to login but the page keep loading after I key in my user ID. The page not move at all to password page. After that, I close the page. I login from my smart phone. Did you know what the message just comes up!!! it's said that either I'm not log out properly at previous time.. Same issue when I tried back to login using my laptop as same message comes up .. Now I'm questions back to you. What the hell am I manage to login into my own account s I never and never manage to login into my account. Idk, please get somebody to call me back ASAP. My contact number was 0173412964 !!!!

Yang benar,
Muhammad Ariff Shah

If you ever find yourself in Chiang Rai, Thailand be sure to pay a visit to Wat Rong Khun, better known as "the white temple". 

The temple was the vision of renown Thai artist Chalermchai Kositpipat who designed and constructed the all-white temple for THB40 million in 1997. It is open all year round to visitors and there is no charge for admission. #CIMBASEANForYou

Spending your Sunday in a mall again? Here's a #ShoppingSunday tip: Don't purchase an item simply because it's cheap! That item will most likely take up extra space in your home or closet if you simply have no use for it. 

Make a conscious decision before that impulse purchase and you'll find yourself having more $$ to spare!

It is time to rethink about this so called "security" feature on your online banking website. Most of the times, due to poor internet connectivity or browser caching error resulted the user being penalized for not being able to log in for the next 5 minutes. If the same glitch happened twice, do you think wasting 10 minutes of user time is justifiable? I don't think so

Do you regard this type of security measure as practical? Sometimes user just have to perform online banking like in case of emergency and let me tell you what.. performing online banking with CIMB just defeating the whole 
convenient' purpose; 

Users are just better off to use other alternative to transfer money instead. CIMB should rethink of this type of feature practicality from user's pov.

In today's technology, there are so many other ways to encounter brute force attack, halting the user to logon for 5 minutes especially coming from banking institution is not only obsolete but unintelligent as well.

Regards,
Shay.

My cash was stuck in your cash deposit machine at johor nusa bestari branch 3 days ago (18-Jan 5pm).
The deposit amount is rm6000, the machine has gone faulty when I was depositing my cash. As a result, I only manage to get back my card, while the cash are still inside the machine and not deposited into my account.

I have filed a report to your customer service, but until today the issue is still yet to resolve. I urge you to solve this matter for me immediately, as not only it is a substantial amount of cash, I also desperately need the fund to pay my housing loan and credit card which are going to due this week. I have phoned to your customer service several times and inform them about the urgency, and urge them to resolve the case ASAP, but until today i still didn't get back my money!

I have pm you my personal details and report number. Please get back to me ASAP. Thanks!

Sy call customer service, nk tanya kenapa tak dpt reload mobile prepaid slps banyak kali mencuba. Mcm biasa, customer service personel tanya 4 digit terakhir kad ATM utk pengesahan. OK la, utk pengesahan, takde masalah. Pas tu dia boleh tanya berapa amount kali terakhir sy withdraw & berapa deposit terakhir kat ATM. Manalah sy ingat, dh lama tak buat ATM transaction. Ni soalan nk bunuh org ke apa? Takde soalan lain ke? Bangang punya customer service, bukannya nk tolong customer...

What's wrong with your IT and App Development team? Are they all retards? This is not my first time having issues with your online banking and your mobile apps. A week ago I already complaint about this issue, your customer service reps call me after few days. She mention that the problems will go away after you guys updated to new webpage and mobile app. But I can say it's BS. Stop making your customer frustrated. Please do proper testing before rolling out. Seriously, CIMB need to restructure your IT department. Send them to IT Service and IT Management courses if you love them so much. Otherwise, CIMB need to start thinking hiring new CIO and the whole department.

What the hell CIMB Clicks?!!! my transfer timed out half way, sent the TAC over and over again and I retried keying in the info 5 times ! it's really testing my patience. The money has to be transferred immediately and the website/app isn't any help at all ! So pissed I swear.
